about_the_game:
A festive bundle to bring a little magic to your next game of Ticket to Ride®! 

Travel across the map in Santa’s Wheels, borrowed from the rosy-cheeked chap himself specially for you. Attach the Special Tree-livery carriage and spread the joy from city to city as you journey across the world. 

Plus, this bundle adds two new player colours – teal and purple. 

INCLUDES:

  • SANTA’S WHEELS TOKEN – Explore the world aboard the most trustworthy and magical vehicle ever! 

  • SPECIAL TREE-LIVERY TOKEN – Brighten up someone’s holiday season with a delivery of the most lovely Christmas three you can find. 

  • TEAL AND PURPLE PLAYER COLOURS – Stand out in your next game with two amazing new player colours: teal and purple. 

Head off on a magical adventure this Christmas with Ticket to Ride®! Play today!

Travel across the map in Santa’s Wheels, borrowed from the rosy-cheeked chap himself specially for you. Attach the Special Tree-livery carriage and spread the joy from city to city as you journey across the world. 

Plus, this bundle adds two new player colours – teal and purple.

  • TEAL AND PURPLE PLAYER COLOURS – Stand out in your next game with two amazing new player colours: teal and purple. 

Head off on a magical adventure this Christmas with Ticket to Ride®! Play today!

package_groups.title: Buy Ticket to Ride® - Winter Wonderland bundle

short_description: Add some festive cheer to your game of Ticket to Ride®! Play with the new Santa’s Wheels and the Special Tree-livery tokens. As a bonus, unlock two brand-new player colours and stand out on the board with teal or purple tokens.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
